original_text: Perhaps a man has a son who refuses to obey his parents. They punish him to teach him what is right, but he refuses to listen to them.
korean_text: 사람에게 완악하고 패역한 아들이 있어 그의 아버지의 말이나 그 어머니의 말을 순종하지 아니하고 부모가 징계하여도 순종하지 아니하거든

sentences.original_text: Perhaps a man has a son
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람에게 아들이 있을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: who refuses to obey his parents
to teach him what is right
but he refuses to listen to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 그들의 말을 듣기를 거부한다
